trans-unit.source: @Ramana's answer worked the best for me, of those here, but I had to add a few catches:
trans-unit.target: @Ramana的答案对我来说最有效，但是我不得不添加一些注意事项：

trans-unit.source: -n1 limits the number of arguments passed to each command pip install -U to be 1
trans-unit.target: -n1 将传递给每个命令 pip install -U 的参数数量限制为1

trans-unit.source: awk '{if(NR>=3)print}' skips header lines
trans-unit.target: awk '{if(NR>=3)print}' 跳过标题行

trans-unit.source: cd into your project directory, then run:
trans-unit.target: cd 进入您的项目目录，然后运行：

trans-unit.source: cut -d' ' -f1 fetches the first column
trans-unit.target: cut -d' ' -f1 获取第一列

trans-unit.source: cut -f1 -d1' ' returns the first word - the name of the outdated package;
trans-unit.target: cut -f1 -d1' ' 返回第一个单词-过时软件包的名称；

trans-unit.source: grep -v -i warning inverted match on warning to avoid errors when updating
trans-unit.target: grep -v -i warning 对 warning 进行反向匹配，以避免更新时出错

trans-unit.source: pip list --outdated gets lines like these
trans-unit.target: pip list --outdated 获取这样的行

trans-unit.source: pip list -o lists outdated packages;
trans-unit.target: pip list -o 列出过时的软件包；

trans-unit.source: pip-review is a fork of pip-tools. See pip-tools issue mentioned by @knedlsepp. pip-review package works but pip-tools package no longer works.
trans-unit.target: pip-review 是 pip-tools 的一个分支。请参阅@knedlsepp提到的 pip-tools 问题。 pip-review 软件包有效，但 pip-tools 软件包不再有效。

trans-unit.source: pip-review works on Windows since version 0.5.
trans-unit.target: pip-review 从0.5版开始，pip-review在Windows上运行。

trans-unit.source: tr "\n|\r" " " converts the multiline result from cut into a single-line, space-separated list;
trans-unit.target: tr "\n|\r" " " 将 cut 的多行结果转换为单行，以空格分隔的列表；

trans-unit.source: xargs -n1 pip install -U takes 1 argument from the pipe left of it, and passes it to the command to upgrade the list of packages.
trans-unit.target: xargs -n1 pip install -U 从其左侧的管道中获取1个参数，并将其传递给命令以升级软件包列表。

trans-unit.source: xargs -n1 keeps going if an error occurs.
trans-unit.target: xargs -n1 如果出现错误，xargs -n1继续运行。

trans-unit.source: (pip > 20.0)
trans-unit.target: （点> 20.0）

trans-unit.target: 高级用法

trans-unit.target: 其它的办法：

trans-unit.target: Details

trans-unit.target: 对于点> = 10.0.1

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: Installation

trans-unit.source: More Robust Solution
trans-unit.target: 更强大的解决方案

trans-unit.source: Note: that there is a feature request for this on the official issue tracker.
trans-unit.target: 注意：官方问题追踪器上对此功能有要求。

trans-unit.source: OSX Oddity
trans-unit.target: OSX奇数

trans-unit.source: Solving Issues with Popular Solutions
trans-unit.target: 用流行的解决方案解决问题

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: Usage

trans-unit.source: pipupgrade helps you upgrade your system, local or packages from a requirements.txt file! It also selectively upgrades packages that don't break change. pipupgrade also ensures to upgrade packages present within multiple Python environments. Compatible with Python2.7+, Python3.4+ and pip9+, pip10+, pip18+, pip19+.
trans-unit.target: pipupgrade可帮助您从 requirements.txt 文件升级系统，本地或软件包！它还有选择地升级不会破坏更改的软件包。pipupgrade还可以确保升级多个Python环境中存在的软件包。与Python2.7 +，Python3.4 +和pip9 +，pip10 +，pip18 +，pip19 +兼容。

trans-unit.source: @endolith: I was hoping for an easy pip.install(dist.key, upgrade=True), too, but it doesn't look like pip was meant to be used by anything but the command line (the docs don't mention the internal API, and the pip developers didn't use docstrings).
trans-unit.target: @endolith：我也希望有一个简单的 pip.install(dist.key, upgrade=True) ，但是看起来pip除了命令行以外没有其他用途（文档中没有提到内部API，并且pip开发人员未使用文档字符串）。

trans-unit.source: Activate your virtualenv (important, because it will also install the new versions of upgraded packages in current virtualenv).
trans-unit.target: 激活你的 virtualenv(很重要,因为它也会在当前 virtualenv 中安装新版本的升级包)。

trans-unit.source: And for Python 2:
trans-unit.target: 而对于Python 2。

trans-unit.source: Because there was no easy way for upgrading package by package, and updating the requirements.txt file, i wrote this pip-upgrader which also updates the versions in your requirements.txt file for the packages chosen (or all packages).
trans-unit.target: 因为没有简单的方法可以逐个软件包升级软件包和更新requirements.txt文件，所以我写了这个pip-upgrader，它也为您 requirements.txt 选择的软件包（或所有软件包）更新了requirements.txt文件中的版本。

trans-unit.source: Crashing of xargs because common pip or pip3 child process failures
trans-unit.target: 由于常见的pip或pip3子进程故障,导致xargs崩溃。

trans-unit.source: Crowded logging from the raw xargs output
trans-unit.target: 从原始xargs输出的拥挤记录

trans-unit.target: Explanation:

trans-unit.target: 有关蛋黄的更多信息：https : //pypi.python.org/pypi/yolk/0.4.3

trans-unit.source: For pip, just remove the 3s as such:
trans-unit.target: 对于pip来说,只要把3s去掉就可以了。

trans-unit.source: For pip3 use this:
trans-unit.target: 对于pip3,使用这个。

trans-unit.source: From https://github.com/cakebread/yolk :
trans-unit.target: 从https://github.com/cakebread/yolk：

trans-unit.source: Full disclosure: I wrote this package.
trans-unit.target: 全面披露:我写了这套方案。

trans-unit.source: Here is a working example:
trans-unit.target: 下面是一个工作实例。

trans-unit.source: How about:
trans-unit.target: 怎么样?

trans-unit.source: How to upgrade all Python packages with pip
trans-unit.target: 如何用pip升级所有Python包

trans-unit.source: I also like the pip-review method:
trans-unit.target: 我也很喜欢pip-review的方法。

trans-unit.source: I had the same problem with upgrading. Thing is, i never upgrade all packages. I upgrade only what i need, because project may break.
trans-unit.target: 我在升级时也遇到了同样的问题。问题是,我从不升级所有的软件包。我只升级我需要的东西,因为项目可能会损坏。

trans-unit.source: I used printf with a space afterwards to properly separate the package names.
trans-unit.target: 之后，我在 printf 后面加上了一个空格，以正确分隔软件包名称。

trans-unit.source: If the requirements are placed in a non-standard location, send them as arguments:
trans-unit.target: 如果要求放置在非标准位置,则以参数形式发送。

trans-unit.source: If you already know what package you want to upgrade, simply send them as arguments:
trans-unit.target: 如果你已经知道你要升级什么包,只需将它们作为参数发送。

trans-unit.source: If you have a problem with a certain package stalling the upgrade (numpy sometimes), just go to the directory ($), comment out the name (add a # before it) and run the upgrade again. You can later uncomment that section back. This is also great for copying python global environments.
trans-unit.target: 如果你对某一个软件包的升级有问题(有时是numpy),只需到目录($),注释出该名称(在其前面加上一个#),然后再次运行升级。以后你可以把那部分内容取消注释回来。这对于复制python全局环境也是很好的。

trans-unit.source: If you need more "fine grained" control over what is omitted and what raises an error you should not add the -n1 flag and explicitly define the errors to ignore, by "piping" the following line for each separate error:
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要对遗漏的内容和引起错误的内容进行更多的“细粒度”控制，则不应添加 -n1 标志并明确定义要忽略的错误，方法是为每个单独的错误“插入”以下行：

trans-unit.source: If you need to upgrade to pre-release / post-release version, add --prerelease argument to your command.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要升级到发行前/发行后版本，请在命令中添加 --prerelease 参数。

trans-unit.source: In cut -d ' ' -f1, -d ' ' sets "space" as the delimiter, -f1 means to get the first column.
trans-unit.target: 在 cut -d ' ' -f1 ， -d ' ' 将“ space”设置为定界符， -f1 表示获取第一列。

trans-unit.source: In older version of pip, you can use this instead:
trans-unit.target: 在旧版本的 pip 中，您可以改用以下命令：

trans-unit.source: In the awk command, NR>2 skips the first two records (lines) and {print $1} selects the first word of each line (as suggested by SergioAraujo, I removed tail -n +3 since awk can indeed handle skipping records).
trans-unit.target: 在awk命令中， NR>2 跳过前两个记录（行），并且 {print $1} 选择每行的第一个单词（如SergioAraujo所建议，我删除了 tail -n +3 ,因为 awk 确实可以处理跳过的记录）。

trans-unit.source: Is it possible to upgrade all Python packages at one time with pip?
trans-unit.target: 是否可以通过 pip 一次升级所有Python软件包？

trans-unit.source: Isn't this more effective?
trans-unit.target: 这样不是更有效果吗?

trans-unit.source: It can do lots of things you'll probably find useful.
trans-unit.target: 它可以做很多事情,你可能会觉得有用。

trans-unit.target: 我的剧本。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: I'm the author of the tool.
trans-unit.target: 注:我是这个工具的作者。

trans-unit.source: Note: there are infinite potential variations for this. I'm trying to keep this answer short and simple, but please do suggest variations in the comments!
trans-unit.target: 请注意:这个问题有无限种可能的变化。我尽量让这个答案简短而简单,但请大家在评论中提出变化的建议!

trans-unit.source: OSX, as of July 2017, ships with a very old version of sed (a dozen years old). To get extended regular expressions, use -E instead of -r in the solution above.
trans-unit.target: OSX,截至2017年7月,自带一个非常老的sed版本(十几年前的)。要获得扩展的正则表达式,请在上面的解决方案中使用-E代替-r。

trans-unit.source: The pip_upgrade_outdated does the job. According to its docs:
trans-unit.target: 该 pip_upgrade_outdated 做这项工作。根据其文档：

trans-unit.source: The -n1 flag for xargs prevents stopping everything if updating one package fails (thanks @andsens).
trans-unit.target: 如果更新一个软件包失败（感谢@andsens），则 xargs 的 -n1 标志可阻止停止所有操作。

trans-unit.source: The grep is to skip editable ("-e") package definitions, as suggested by @jawache. (Yes, you could replace grep+cut with sed or awk or perl or...).
trans-unit.target: 所述 grep 是跳过编辑（“-e”）包的定义，通过@jawache的建议。（是的，您可以将 grep + cut 替换为 sed 或 awk 或 perl 或...）。

trans-unit.source: The site-packages check excludes my development packages, because they are not located in the system site-packages directory. The try-except simply skips packages that have been removed from PyPI.
trans-unit.target: 该 site-packages 检查排除我的开发包，因为它们不是位于系统site-packages目录。try-except仅跳过已从PyPI中删除的软件包。

trans-unit.source: The above command uses the simplest and most portable pip syntax in combination with sed and sh to overcome these issues completely. Details of sed operation can be scrutinized with the commented version<sup>2</sup>.
trans-unit.target: <font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">上面的命令结合使用sed和sh来使用最简单，最可移植的pip语法来完全克服这些问题。</font><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">sed操作的详细信息可以通过注释的版本</font></font><sup><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">2</font></font></sup><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">进行审查</font><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">。</font></font>
